physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 7 x 5 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: Handwritten on back of photograph: ''#124, Ricka (Fredricka) Saft Schayer, Born 1847 Germany, Died 1921 Denver, Colo.''

mods.abstract: Ricka (Fredricka) Saft Schayer, wife of Charles M. Schayer, posed for a formal portrait.
mods.note: Appears in ''Images of America: Jewish Denver 1859-1940,'' by Dr. Jeanne Abrams, on page 18.
Donated by Mr. and Mrs. Charles Schayer.
